languages.text: {n}Криво ухмыльнувшись, Владайм тягуче произносит:{/n} "Выходит, вы мне и оружие дадите?.. Прекрасно. Я смиренно принимаю приговор".
{n}Vladaym smiles wryly and drawls,{/n} "So... are you going to give me a weapon too? Fantastic. I humbly accept my sentence."
languages.original_text: {n}Криво ухмыльнувшись, Владайм тягуче произносит:{/n} "Выходит, вы мне и оружие дадите?.. Прекрасно. Я смиренно принимаю приговор".

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym smiles wryly and drawls,{/n} "So... you're gonna give me a weapon too? Fantastic. I humbly accept my sentence."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: {n}弗拉迪姆挖苦地笑了起来。{/n}“也就是说……你打算给我一把武器吗？真是太棒了，我谦卑地接受我的判决。”
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym smiles wryly and drawls,{/n} "So... are you going to give me a weapon too? Fantastic. I humbly accept my sentence."

traits.locale_text: {n}弗拉迪姆挖苦地笑了起来。{/n}“也就是说……你打算给我一把武器吗？真是太棒了，我谦卑地接受我的判决。”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: {n}ヴラダイムは不敵な笑みを浮かべ、ゆっくり話す。{/n}「つまり…あなたも私に武器を渡すつもりなのか？素晴らしい。刑を、受け入れよう」
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym smiles wryly and drawls,{/n} "So... are you going to give me a weapon too? Fantastic. I humbly accept my sentence."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴラダイムは不敵な笑みを浮かべ、ゆっくり話す。{/n}「つまり…あなたも私に武器を渡すつもりなのか？素晴らしい。刑を、受け入れよう」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Vladaym sonríe irónicamente y balbucea:{/n} «Así que... ¿también va a darme un arma? Genial. Acepto humildemente mi sentencia».
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym smiles wryly and drawls,{/n} "So... are you going to give me a weapon too? Fantastic. I humbly accept my sentence."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym sonríe irónicamente y balbucea:{/n} «Así que... ¿también va a darme un arma? Genial. Acepto humildemente mi sentencia».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Vladaym lächelt trocken und sagt langgezogen:{/n} "Also ... gebt Ihr mir auch eine Waffe? Fantastisch. Ich nehme meine Strafe demütigst an."
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym smiles wryly and drawls,{/n} "So... are you going to give me a weapon too? Fantastic. I humbly accept my sentence."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym lächelt trocken und sagt langgezogen:{/n} "Also ... gebt Ihr mir auch eine Waffe? Fantastisch. Ich nehme meine Strafe demütigst an."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Avec un sourire ironique, Vladaym répond d'une voix traînante :{/n} « Et vous allez me donner une arme, en plus ? Merveilleux. J'accepte humblement ma sentence. »
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym smiles wryly and drawls,{/n} "So... are you going to give me a weapon too? Fantastic. I humbly accept my sentence."

traits.locale_text: {n}Avec un sourire ironique, Vladaym répond d'une voix traînante :{/n} « Et vous allez me donner une arme, en plus ? Merveilleux. J'accepte humblement ma sentence. »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Vladaym, alaycı bir şekilde gülümseyip kelimeleri uzata uzata konuşuyor.{/n} "Yani... Bana bir de silah vereceksiniz, öyle mi? Harikulade. Cezamı alçak gönüllülükle kabul ediyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym smiles wryly and drawls,{/n} "So... are you going to give me a weapon too? Fantastic. I humbly accept my sentence."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym alaycı bir şekilde gülümsüyor ve kelimeleri uzata uzata konuşuyor:{/n} "Yani... Bana bir de silah vereceksiniz, öyle mi? Harikulade. Cezamı alçak gönüllülükle kabul ediyorum."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04
